page.title: 13POPULATION
page.content: The area is fairly thinly populated especially in the farming areas and most of the people living in the area are concentrated in the estates in the Treswithian area.The villages in the area are very small and have few or none of the amenities associated with the traditional life of a village.The estates likewise are not well served with shops etc. though they are near the recreation area of the public park.The other,much smaller centres of population are Kehelland,Higher Penponds,Reskadinnick and part of Connor Downs.
